author: cbs8
title: Global Automotive Fuel Tank Market 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON , Sept. 1, About automotive fuel tanks
Automotive fuel tanks differ in size, design, and capacity depending on the vehicle type. Fuel tanks typically are constructed using materials such as steel and plastic. While plastic high-density polyethylene fuel tanks are made by blow molding, steel or aluminum fuel tanks are welded from the stamped sheets. In general, a fuel tank should avoid fuel leakage and limit evaporation emissions.
The increase in automotive production as well as government regulations globally (for reducing the weight of vehicles and increasing the fuel economy) are contributing to the growth of the market.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global automotive fuel tank market to grow at a CAGR of 5.89% during 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global automotive fuel tank market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers production units of global automotive fuel tanks at the OEMs level.
The report also segments the global automotive fuel tank market on the basis of:
- Geography: APAC, Americas, and EMEA
- Vehicle type: passenger cars, light commercial vehicle, and heavy commercial vehicle
Technavio's report, Global Automotive Fuel Tank Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the leading six vendors in the market. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
